pr_title: Make backupMap volatile to make it visible to user thread

timeline.bodyText: The backupMap is initialized with the HashMap that is not thread-safe. Is it handled properly that multiple threads are not accessing it?
timeline.author: petrpleshachkov

replies.bodyText: fixed it by making backupMap a CHM.
replies.author: ahmetmircik

timeline.bodyText: This mix of referring to a local variable and the field is a bit confusing. Can you elaborate a bit or simply use the local variable only when checking the size and adding to backup map?
timeline.author: mmedenjak

replies.bodyText: now it should be more clear
replies.author: ahmetmircik

timeline.message: Make backupMap volatile to make it visible to user thread
